item.ring_of_miner.ring_of_miner.tip1: Breaks most vanilla blocks around the player
item.ring_of_miner.ring_of_miner.tip2: Sneak + right-click to set area to break 11x5x11
item.ring_of_miner.ring_of_miner.tip3: Right-click to break blocks in set area
item.ring_of_miner.ring_of_miner.tip8: Scan complete, right-click again to break blocks.
item.ring_of_miner.ring_of_miner.tip10: Hold a stick in off hand to obtain block drops
